import React from 'react' import './MovieDetails.css' import {Link,useParams} from 'react-router-dom' export default function MovieDetails() { const param=useParams(); //get movie by details const getMovieDetails=async()=>{ const res=await axios.get('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=52ef927bbeb21980cd91386a29403c78&language=ar') console.log(res.data.total_pages) setMovies(res.data.results) setpageCount(res.data.total_pages) } return (
